summary: This is a Medium sized house perched on top of a waterfall just west of windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
This is a Medium sized house perched on top of a waterfall just west of windhelm.

The house includes a enchanting table ,an alchemy area ,a target range ,a storage room ,a bedroom ,a balcony with a scenic view and a hidden cave behind the waterfall theres also a cooking pot and a smithing area inside the cave.
I created it for myself but any suggestions are welcome and if you find any bugs please let me know.
I may go in to more detail and make the house better looking but that depends on if people like it.I may also upload some more screen shots later.

----To Install unzip the file to the skyrim data folder and select the plugin in the launcher or mod manager----
If you want an easier install go to the steam workshop version here - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89223856

Cheers MrSimBo
author: MrSimBo xlkreaper
